DOC.brief_summary: ELDERL-IE multicenter national prospective observational study . The main objective describe geriatric characteristic ( comorbidities , cognitive status , autonomy , nutritional status , balance walking ) patient age 75 year older infective endocarditis ( IE ) . The secondary objective assess impact geriatric feature medico - surgical care morbidity mortality 3 month end hospitalization , describe initial clinical presentation diagnostic modality IE elderly .
